title: Pope Leo calls for ‘deep reflection’ about treatment of detained migrants in the United States
description: Speaking outside the papal retreat at Castel Gandolfo, he addressed various geopolitical issues, including U.S. military actions off Venezuela and the fragile truce in the Middle East. He noted that military actions are increasing tensions and urged dialogue.
content: VATICAN CITY (AP) — Pope Leo XIV called for “deep reflection” in the United States about the treatment of migrants held in detention, saying that “many people who have lived for years and years and years, never causing problems, have been deeply affe... [2129 chars]

title: Satellite Photo Reveals US Air Power for Caribbean Campaign
description: The U.S. military has stepped up its presence in the region as it looks to intensify strikes amid tensions with Venezuela.
content:
Satellite imagery showed a surge of U.S. air power at the former Naval Air Station Roosevelt Roads, near Ceiba, Puerto Rico.
Eight F-35 fighters, two C-17 transports, and a KC-130 tanker are deployed as the aircraft carrier USS Gerald R. Ford and its... [3448 chars]

title: US likely jammed GPS signals off Venezuela coast, expert tells Sky News
description: Disruption to navigation signals has been picked up around Trinidad and Tobago, where a US warship had been stationed amid escalating tensions in the region.
content:
High levels of GPS jamming detected off the coast of Venezuela were likely being carried out by the US, an expert has told Sky News.
Disruption to navigation signals has been picked up around Trinidad and Tobago, where a US warship had been stationed... [5065 chars]

title: Democracy, drugs or oil: Trump’s plot to overthrow Maduro
description: In an Iraq-like strategy, Donald Trump wants to destabilise Venezuela for oil while dismissing reports and intel contradicting his allegations.
content:

description: Alexei Zhuravlev also said Russia isn't restricted from sending offensive weapons, such as the Oreshnik ballistic missile, to Venezuela.

title: Del simulador a seguir los pasos de Palou
description: Iván Machado se ganó pasar a la pista, venció en su primera competición en pista en EEUU y va camino de la Indycar
content:

title: Segundo día de CADE Ejecutivos 2025: democracia, institucionalidad y competitividad en el centro del debate empresarial
description: El segundo día del CADE Ejecutivos 2025 abordará los desafíos de la democracia, la institucionalidad y la competitividad. La jornada incluirá exposiciones de Denisse Miralles, Luis Carranza, Bartolomé Abdala, Diego Macera y María Corina Machado, así como debates sobre empleo, justicia, salud, educación y liderazgo empresarial.
content: El segundo día del CADE Ejecutivos 2025, que se desarrollará este miércoles 5 de noviembre, pondrá el foco en la institucionalidad, la libertad y la justicia como pilares del desarrollo, con un llamado a fortalecer la democracia, dinamizar la economí... [5007 chars]

title: Nicolás Maduro: “Soy más famoso que Taylor Swift y Bad Bunny en Estados Unidos”
description: En un congreso chavista, el dictador se refirió cn sarcasmo a la atención que le prestan los medios de comunicación del país norteamericano. Tambén dijo que en Venezuela gobierna “un poderoso movimiento popular unido y armado”
content: El dictador de Venezuela, Nicolás Maduro, se burló este martes de las menciones que hacen de él los medios de comunicación en Estados Unidos y dijo sentirse “más famoso” que la estrella del pop Taylor Swift en ese país, en un contexto marcado por las... [2246 chars]
